strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_VAN
strModelFlags.description: Allows double doors for the rear doors animation.

strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_BUS
strModelFlags.description: Uses bus animations for entry/exit.

strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_LOW
strModelFlags.description: Uses animations suitable for cars with a low ride-height.

strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_BIG
strModelFlags.description: Changes the way that the AI drives around corners.

strModelFlags.name: MF_ABS_STD
strModelFlags.description: Arcade Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped as standard; minimal slip allowed.

strModelFlags.name: MF_ABS_OPTION
strModelFlags.description: Arcade Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped w/ brakes upgrade.

strModelFlags.name: MF_ABS_ALT_STD
strModelFlags.description: Realistic Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped as standard; some slip allowed.

strModelFlags.name: MF_ABS_ALT_OPTION
strModelFlags.description: Realistic Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) equipped w/brakes upgrade.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_DOORS
strModelFlags.description: For vehicles that don't have any operable doors.

strModelFlags.name: MF_TANDEM_SEATING
strModelFlags.description: Two people will use the front passenger seat.

strModelFlags.name: MF_SIT_IN_BOAT
strModelFlags.description: Uses seated boat animation instead of standing.

strModelFlags.name: MF_HAS_TRACKS
strModelFlags.description: For vehicles with tracks instead of tires.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_EXHAUST
strModelFlags.description: Removes all exhaust particles.

strModelFlags.name: MF_DOUBLE_EXHAUST
strModelFlags.description: Creates a second exhaust by mirroring the model's exhaust over the y-axis.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_1STPERSON_LOOKBEHIND
strModelFlags.description: Prevents player using rear view when in first-person mode.

strModelFlags.name: MF_CAN_ENTER_IF_NO_DOOR
strModelFlags.description: Allows entry into the vehicle despite no currently accessible doors.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_F_TORSION
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels stay vertical to the car.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_F_SOLID
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels stay parallel to each other.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_F_MCPHERSON
strModelFlags.description: Front wheels can tilt.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_R_TORSION
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels stay vertical to the car.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_R_SOLID
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels stay parallel to each other.

strModelFlags.name: MF_AXLE_R_MCPHERSON
strModelFlags.description: Rear wheels can tilt.

strModelFlags.name: MF_DONT_FORCE_GRND_CLEARANCE
strModelFlags.description: Chassis COL is taken into account when suspension is compressed while hitting the ground, with sparks rendered.

strModelFlags.name: MF_DONT_RENDER_STEER
strModelFlags.description: Does not render steering animations.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_WHEEL_BURST
strModelFlags.description: Has Bulletproof Tires as standard.

strModelFlags.name: MF_INDESTRUCTIBLE
strModelFlags.description: Can't explode or be considered inoperable from damage.

strModelFlags.name: MF_DOUBLE_FRONT_WHEELS
strModelFlags.description: Places a second instance of each front wheel next to the normal one.

strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_RC
strModelFlags.description: For RC vehicles such as the RC Bandito and Invade & Persuade Tank. The player model is hidden upon entering the vehicle.

strModelFlags.name: MF_DOUBLE_REAR_WHEELS
strModelFlags.description: Duplicates the skidmarks of the rear tires.

strModelFlags.name: MF_NO_WHEEL_BREAK
strModelFlags.description: Prevents wheel bones from detaching off the vehicle due to damage.

strModelFlags.name: MF_IS_HATCHBACK
strModelFlags.description: Uses animations suitable for Trunk doors on hatchback-style vehicle bodies.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_SMOOTHED_COMPRESSION
strHandlingFlags.description: Simulates progressive spring suspension. Makes suspension compression motion smoother.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_REDUCED_MOD_MASS
strHandlingFlags.description: Reduces mass added from upgrades.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_HAS_KERS
strHandlingFlags.description: Partially enables KERS on the vehicle; disables horn and shows the recharge bar below the minimap. KERS boost itself still needs to be enabled by the SET_VEHICLE_KERS_ALLOWED native.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_HAS_TRACKS
strHandlingFlags.description: Inverts the way grip works on the vehicle; with this flag enabled, grip starts at the fTractionCurveMin value and may increase up to the fTractionCurveMax value upon wheel slip. Grip stays at max beyond the vehicle's peak slip angle.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_NO_HANDBRAKE
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables handbrake control for the vehicle.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_STEER_REARWHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Steers the rear wheels instead of the front.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_HANDBRAKE_REARWHEELSTEER
strHandlingFlags.description: Handbrake control makes the rear wheels steer as well as the front.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_STEER_ALL_WHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Steers all wheels, similar to 4-wheel-steering systems found on real vehicles. The rear wheels will steer at the same lock angle as the front, as defined by fSteeringLock.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_FREEWHEEL_NO_GAS
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables engine-braking when no throttle is applied.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_NO_REVERSE
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables reversing for the vehicle.

strHandlingFlags.name: _HF_UNKNOWN_10
strHandlingFlags.description: Unknown. Name hash: 0x4C11C7F9

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_STEER_NO_WHEELS
strHandlingFlags.description: Disables steering on all wheels, used with tracked vehicles.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_CVT
strHandlingFlags.description: Gives the vehicle a fixed-ratio transmission with a gear ratio of 0.90, used for vehicles with nInitialDriveGears=1. If gears amount to more than 1, it will simply force the vehicle into top gear upon acceleration. Recommended for electric vehicles.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_LESS_SNOW_SINK
strHandlingFlags.description: Less grip loss from deep mud/snow, most notably in North Yankton.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_TYRES_CAN_CLIP
strHandlingFlags.description: Tires are allowed to clip into the pavement when under enough pressure, effectiveness depends on tire sidewall. Generally makes the vehicle deal with uneven terrain better. Notes: this is the reason Offroad Tires improve performance on specific vehicles made by R*.

strHandlingFlags.name: _HF_UNKNOWN_19
strHandlingFlags.description: Unknown. name hash: 0x2DEA7A05

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_OFFROAD_ABILITIES
strHandlingFlags.description: Gravity constant increased by 10% to 10.78 m/s^2, resulting in increased grip and faster falling when airborne. Acceleration and braking performance is also increased by 10%.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_OFFROAD_ABILITIES_X2
strHandlingFlags.description: Gravity constant increased by 20% to 11.76 m/s^2, resulting in increased grip and faster falling when airborne. Acceleration and braking performance is also increased by 20%. Vehicle does not react to bushes.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_TYRES_RAISE_SIDE_IMPACT_THRESHOLD
strHandlingFlags.description: Includes the tires in the general side collision hitbox of the vehicle. Recommended for vehicles whose wheels extend beyond the bodywork, like monster-trucks.

strHandlingFlags.name: _HF_INCREASED_GRAVITY
strHandlingFlags.description: Gravity constant increased by 20% to 11.76 m/s^2, resulting in increased grip and faster falling when airborne. Acceleration and braking performance is also increased by 20%. Vehicle does not react to bushes. Identical to HF_OFFROAD_ABILITIES_X2.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_ENABLE_LEAN
strHandlingFlags.description: ??? Notes: Possibly for motorcycle leaning or boat leaning.

strHandlingFlags.name: _HF_ALLOW_MOTORCYCLE_TRACTION_LOSS
strHandlingFlags.description: Allows motorcycles to lose traction.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_ARMOURED
strHandlingFlags.description: Prevents vehicle doors (including hood and trunk) from opening in collisions.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_IMPROVED_RIGHTING_FORCE
strHandlingFlags.description: Adds extra force to the vehicle when attempting to flip it back on its wheels.

strHandlingFlags.name: HF_LAST_AVAILABLE_FLAG
strHandlingFlags.description: Most likely doesn't do anything.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_DRIVER_SIDE_FRONT_DOOR
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the driver-side front door (door_dside_f) bone as non-breakable.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_DRIVER_SIDE_REAR_DOOR
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the driver-side rear door (door_dside_r) bone as non-breakable.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_DRIVER_PASSENGER_SIDE_FRONT_DOOR
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the passenger-side front door (door_pside_f) bone as non-breakable.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_DRIVER_PASSENGER_SIDE_REAR_DOOR
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the passenger-side rear door (door_pside_r) bone as non-breakable.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_BONNET
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the bonnet bone as non-breakable.

strDamageFlags.name: DF_BOOT
strDamageFlags.description: Marks the boot bone as non-breakable.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_FRONT
strAdvancedFlags.description: Unknown. Note from Rockstar: 'If we want torsen diffs they will need to know resistance at the wheel as applying the brakes should apply force back to the wheel on the ground'.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_REAR
strAdvancedFlags.description: Unknown. Note from Rockstar: 'If we want torsen diffs they will need to know resistance at the wheel as applying the brakes should apply force back to the wheel on the ground'

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_CENTRE
strAdvancedFlags.description: When enabled, transfers the drive force from the slipping wheels to the less-driven wheels.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_LIMITED_FRONT
strAdvancedFlags.description: Unknown. Seems to have a similar effect to _AF_SMOOTH_REV_1ST, but with later upshifts.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_LOCKING_FRONT
strAdvancedFlags.description: Unknown. Using this flag causes the vehicle's front wheels to wheelspin if the player is holding down the handbrake and forwards/backwards keys.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_DIFF_LOCKING_REAR
strAdvancedFlags.description: Using the handbrake slows the car down more smoothly and, most of the time, without leaving tire marks.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_GEARBOX_MANUAL
strAdvancedFlags.description: Unknown. Sets the clutch value to 0.0 when idling.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_GEARBOX_ELECTRIC
strAdvancedFlags.description: Used by the Omnis e-GT.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_ALLOW_REDUCED_SUSPENSION_FORCE
strAdvancedFlags.description: Allows the vehicle to be stanced using the SET_REDUCED_SUSPENSION_FORCE native. Requires the CF_FIX_OLD_BUGS flag to be enabled.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_HARD_REV_LIMIT
strAdvancedFlags.description: Only working for Tuner cars, this uncaps the RPM in last gear which causes the power to drop off and lower the top speed of the car (effectively creating a speed cap in last gear). Previously this flag changed gear shift behaviour to cause earlier upshifts with a hard rev limit per gear, but this was changed with the Criminal Enterprises update.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_HOLD_GEAR_WITH_WHEELSPIN
strAdvancedFlags.description: Later upshifts; usually hits the gear's rev limit before shifting.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_INCREASE_SUSPENSION_FORCE_WITH_SPEED
strAdvancedFlags.description: Anti-downforce suspension; increases suspension spring force as vehicle goes faster.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_BLOCK_INCREASED_ROT_VELOCITY_WITH_DRIVE_FORCE
strAdvancedFlags.description: Generates fake wheelspin after an instance of real wheelspin; Tyres will stabilize and show 0.0m/s of slip with debugging data, but the traction behaves like it's still spinning.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_REDUCED_SELF_RIGHTING_SPEED
strAdvancedFlags.description: Reduces righting force of the vehicle, effectively making it much harder and slower to flip back on its wheels.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_CLOSE_RATIO_GEARBOX
strAdvancedFlags.description: Extends the duration of the first gear, giving the vehicle a slower launch with greatly reduced wheelspin.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_FORCE_SMOOTH_RPM
strAdvancedFlags.description: Smooth first-gear revving; resistance to hitting the rev-limit.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_ALLOW_TURN_ON_SPOT
strAdvancedFlags.description: Allows the vehicle to be rotated left or right while parked on the spot. Intended for tanks/tracked vehicles.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_CAN_WHEELIE
strAdvancedFlags.description: Allows the vehicle to perform a handbrake wheelie. The Muscle vehicle class is hardcoded to use this flag.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_ENABLE_WHEEL_BLOCKER_SIDE_IMPACTS
strAdvancedFlags.description: Makes the wheels much less likely to clip into the ground when the vehicle is tipped over.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_FIX_OLD_BUGS
strAdvancedFlags.description: Forced stock-tyre clipping boundaries, the sidewall gain/loss from a custom tyre will not matter. Refer to strHandlingFlags 00020000 above. Also prevents lowering the vehicle by shooting at its wheels/suspension. This flag is required in addition to CF_ALLOW_REDUCED_SUSPENSION_FORCE to stance the vehicle through script.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_USE_DOWNFORCE_BIAS
strAdvancedFlags.description: Changes the way Downforce and spoiler tuning works, uses the setup found on Open-Wheel class vehicles in the vanilla game. Each spoiler/bumper tuning has to be given AdvancedData values to affect downforce. Adjusts initial downforce from fDownforceModifier. 'Curb - boosting' seems to be nullified.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_REDUCE_BODY_ROLL_WITH_SUSPENSION_MODS
strAdvancedFlags.description: Reduces body-roll if suspension upgrades are equipped. In addition, the vehicle gains more grip with each suspension option.

strAdvancedFlags.name: CF_ALLOWS_EXTENDED_MODS
strAdvancedFlags.description: Requires AdvancedData to work. Adds Turbo-affecting mods for mod slot 20 (VMT_KNOB) parts, and power-affecting mods for mod slot 22 (VMT_ICE) parts.

strAdvancedFlags.name: N/A
strAdvancedFlags.description: Flag does not exist.

strAdvancedFlags.name: N/A
strAdvancedFlags.description: Flag does not exist.
